Create EclipseLocator Eclipse_ITASAT1;
GMAT Eclipse_ITASAT1.Spacecraft = ITASAT1;
GMAT Eclipse_ITASAT1.Filename = 'ITASAT1_ecl.txt';
GMAT Eclipse_ITASAT1.OccultingBodies = {Earth, Luna};
GMAT Eclipse_ITASAT1.InputEpochFormat = 'TAIModJulian';
GMAT Eclipse_ITASAT1.InitialEpoch = '21545';
GMAT Eclipse_ITASAT1.StepSize = 10;
GMAT Eclipse_ITASAT1.FinalEpoch = '21545.138';
GMAT Eclipse_ITASAT1.UseLightTimeDelay = true;
GMAT Eclipse_ITASAT1.UseStellarAberration = true;
GMAT Eclipse_ITASAT1.WriteReport = true;
GMAT Eclipse_ITASAT1.RunMode = Automatic;
GMAT Eclipse_ITASAT1.UseEntireInterval = true;
GMAT Eclipse_ITASAT1.EclipseTypes = {'Umbra', 'Penumbra', 'Antumbra'};
